positive_examples: This is an example of opening valve.
The opening valve demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed opening valve in this context.
A typical case of opening valve would involve these features.
The concept of opening valve applies here.
The mechanical motion of adjusting a valve mechanism to allow fluid or gas flow.
negative_examples: This is an example of opening eyes, not opening valve.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: OpeningEyes, or other types of Opening

definition: The action of moving a valve to allow flow through a passage.
